price: 116. Lokumu na Allah wa likolo mokonzi ya sólo. Nzambe mosusu ya kobondela na bosoló azali te sé ye (mei) Nkolo ngwende ya lokumu.
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
